GK-2A AMI LRIT DOP(Daily Operation Plan)
BY NATIONAL METEOROLOGICAL SATELLITE CENTER, KOREA METEOROLOGICAL ADMINISTRATION
DISSEMINATION SCHEDULE FROM 2020/08/10
UPDATE 2020/08/10
NOTE: 

＊FOR SEMI REAL-TIME INFORMATION ON GK-2A OPERATION, PLEASE REFER TO FOLLOWING WEBSITE. (http://nmsc.kma.go.kr)
＊A wheel off-loading maneuver is scheduled from [15:28:00.000] on [2019/04/19]. 
   For about 20 minutes, the image quality might be temporarily deteriorated. 
   For about 20 minutes, the image might be disseminated with chipping. (See the following schedule for the details)

＊A wheel off-loading maneuver is scheduled from [06:09:00.000] on [2019/08/21].  
   For about 20 minutes, the image quality might be temporarily deteriorated. 
   For about 20 minutes, the image might be disseminated with chipping. (See the following schedule for the details)

＊A wheel off-loading maneuver is scheduled from [00:47:00.000] on [2019/12/20].  
   For about 20 minutes, the image quality might be temporarily deteriorated. 
   For about 20 minutes, the image might be disseminated with chipping. (See the following schedule for the details)

＊Due to event of sun intrusion into the sensor(from [00:00:00.000] to [00:00:00.000] on [2019/01/01]), some image dissemination will be cancel (See the following schedule for the details).

232940-233000	EGMSG141		O
233006-233236	FD140	FD	O
233940-234000	EGMSG142		O
234006-234236	FD141	FD	O
234940-235000	EGMSG143		O
235006-235236	FD142	FD	O
235940-000000	EGMSG144		O
000006-000236	FD143	FD	O

ABBREVIATIONS:
IMAGERY IN ALL WAVELENGTH WILL BE DISSEMINATED EACH TIME

FXX : FULL DISK(FD) OBSERVATION (XX DENOTES SEQUENTIAL NUMBER OF DAILY SCHEDULE)
EXX : EXTENDED NORTHERN HEMISPHERE(ENH) OBSERVATION
LXX : LIMITED SOUTHERN HEMISPHERE(LSH) OBSERVATION
AXX : ASIAN-PACIFIC NORTHERN HEMISPHERE(APNH) OBSERVATION
ANTXX: ALPHA NUMERIC TEXT(WEEKLY OPERATION PLAN)
GOCIXX : GEOSTATIONARY OCEAN COLOR IMAGER(L2 IMAGE)
CTXX     : CLOUD TYPE(L2 IMAGE)
CTTXX   : CLOUD TOP TEMPERATURE(L2 IMAGE)
CTHXX   : CLOUD TOP HEIGHT(L2 IMAGE)

O   : OBSERVATION AND DISSEMINATION ARE SCHEDULED
X   : SCHEDULED LRIT WILL BE CANCELED

REMARKS: 
1) IN CASE OF SYSTEM MAINTENANCE, THE SCHEDULE WILL BE CANCELED. 
2) IN CASE OF ECLIPSE OPERATION OR SOLAR-INTERFERENCE OPERATION, THE SCHEDULE WILL BE CHANGED. 
3) THE SCHEDULE IS SUBJECT  TO CHANGE WITHOUT NOTICE. 
4) CONVERSION EQUATION (DIGITAL NUMBER TO RADIANCE)

    RADIANCE = GAIN × DIGITAL NUMBER + OFFSET

		GAIN(SIDE A)          OFFSET(SIDE A)          GAIN(SIDE B)          OFFSET(SIDE B)
VI006	0.154856294393539 *4*4 	-6.194244384765620 	6.457599956890890 	39.999952272034100 	0.0019244840 
SW038	-0.00108296517282724000 *16*4 	17.69998741149900000000 	-923.390728613509000 	16344.004272354000000 	-0.447843939824124 	1.000655680903890 	-6.338240899124480E-08
WV069	-0.00818779878318309000 *8*4 	66.74807739257810000000 	-122.132947631041000 	8152.139440660400000 	-0.334311414359106 	1.000973598744680 	-4.946030702523040E-07
IR105	-0.01981969550251960000 *8*4 	161.58013916015600000000 	-50.454861926252800 	8152.503611350380000 	-0.142866448475177 	1.000640695720490 	-5.504432949604980E-07

GK-2A AMI LRIT DOP END;
